text: Miss America 1983, the 56th Miss America pageant, was from on the Boardwalk Hall in Atlantic City, New Jersey on September 11, 1982 on NBC Network. Pageant winner Debra Maffett later became a television personality and producer. ==Results== ===Placements=== {| class="wikitable" ! Final results !
